ValidationRule.description: Prevent the Set Up Fee Amount field from being updated multiple times.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(Set_Up_Fee_Amount__c), ( NOT(ISNULL(PRIORVALUE(Set_Up_Fee_Amount__c))) ), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE Handbook Supervisor team 3"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE HR Services Supervisor team 1"), ($UserRole.Name <> "HRE HR Services Supervisor team 2"), ($UserRole.Name <> "System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the 'Set Up Fee Amount' value.
